H0.text: What is the name for the Vietnamese New Year? (Hint: three letters). Lun

H1.text: What is the name for the Vietnamese New Year? (Hint: three letters). Duc

H2.text: What is the name for the Vietnamese New Year? (Hint: three letters). Hoi

H3.text: What is the name for the Vietnamese New Year? (Hint: three letters). Tết

A4.text: Tết (Vietnamese: [tet̚˧˦], chữ Hán: 節) is the most important celebration in Vietnamese culture.

A5.text: The name Tết is a shortening of Tết Nguyên Đán, literally written as tết (meaning 'festivals'; only used in festival names) and nguyên đán which means the first day of the year.
